name: The Bonemask of Disappearence
data: It decreases the users strength slightly.
It decreases the users constitution slightly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has decent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'greater invisibility'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'spacial manipulation'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It affects the user's skill knowledge.
It affects the user's spell knowledge.
